Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[Overpopulated: Enables gizmo that shows buildings with more households than their capacity.
Upon savefile loading, dumps to the log a list of buildings that have more households than their capacity.
Patches the savefile loading process so it will not create buildings with more households or companies than their capacity.
Patches the household removal system so it will not create property renters detached from properties.
Separates household and citizen removal processes. This prevents a rare race conditon leading to more frequent renter issues. Valid only with the Renter fix enabled.
